verses.name: Psalms 35:14
verses.text: I behaved myself as though he had been my friend or brother: I bowed down heavily, as one that mourneth for his mother.

verses.name: Psalms 35:15
verses.text: But in mine adversity they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together: yea, the abjects gathered themselves together against me, and I knew it not; they did tear me, and ceased not:

verses.name: Psalms 35:16
verses.text: With hypocritical mockers in feasts, they gnashed upon me with their teeth.

verses.name: Psalms 35:17
verses.text: Lord, how long wilt thou look on? rescue my soul from their destructions, my darling from the lions.

verses.name: Psalms 35:18
verses.text: I will give thee thanks in the great congregation: I will praise thee among much people.
